channel.title: Command page
channel.description: Hi everyone,I started building a P server yesterday with Pimpscape source, So far ive added shops, How do i actually make a command that will make a pop up thing and have all the rules.. I know how to add a command in.. But like on some other servers ive seen you do ::serverhelp or something and a page comes up, How do i do that? Thanks

item.title: Command page
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Hi everyone,I started building a P server yesterday with Pimpscape source, So far ive added shops, How do i actually make a command that will make a pop up thing and have all the rules… I know how to add a command in… But like on some other servers ive seen you do ::serverhelp or something and a page comes up, How do i do that? Thanks
